definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: By doing so, she would risk committing a sacrilege.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來她就會冒褻瀆神明的危險。

sentences.english: What is the significance of a blasphemy charge?
sentences.chinese: 此次褻瀆神明的控告的意義在哪兒？

sentences.english: Such a figure is liable to be attacked as a blasphemer.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的人很容易被人抨擊爲褻瀆神明。

sentences.english: He is, after all, on trial for his life, for the charge of impiety.
sentences.chinese: 他可是在接受生死攸關的審判，罪名是褻瀆神明。

sentences.english: Pakistan's blasphemy laws date back to the colonial era.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦的褻瀆神明法發端於殖民時代。
